means: 使烂醉，使迷糊，使沉醉( besot的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He became so besotted with her that even his children were forgotten.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被她迷得神魂颠倒，连孩子都抛到了九霄云外。

sentence.Network_en: Her father was besotted with the new arrival.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的父亲完全沉浸在新生儿带来的喜悦中。

sentence.Network_en: He is completely besotted with his new girlfriend.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对他的新女友一片痴心。

PerfectNetExp.abs: I. 「愚蠢」(foolish) 、「痴迷」(besotted) 、「不正常」、「有问题」。男人愚蠢及痴迷的例子 1. 阿强的故事---健康赌徒     2. 阿发的故 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) -亿城英语 ... besot 使烂醉 besotted 愚蠢的 besought 恳求.
沉迷英语怎样写_百度知道 ... 沉迷;放纵自己 indulge 沉迷...的;昏迷的 besotted 迷路;沉迷;没有了消息,不见踪影 lose oneself.
This kind besotted , fatuous manner , was precisely Dickens must the bourgeoisie ruler then take warning ., 这种执迷不悟 , 冥顽不化的态度 , 正是狄更斯要当时的资产阶级统治者引以为戒的.

list.abs: 刚要,即将 Be angry about sth因某事而生气 Be besotted about sb迷恋某人 Be careful about sharing too much too soon.
Her youth and beauty besotted him ., 她的年轻美貌迷住了他.
" He seems besotted , " said Danglars , pushing Caderousse with his knee ., " 他看上去不大对头 , " 腾格拉尔碰碰卡德鲁斯的膝盖说.
he is besotted by her beauty ., 她的美丽使他如痴如醉.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: past participle of besot 'make foolishly affectionate', from be- 'cause to be' + sot

entry.tran: 沉迷的；痴迷的；神魂颠倒的
entry.def: If you are besotted with someone or something, you like them so much that you seem foolish or silly.

example.ex: He became so besotted with her that even his children were forgotten.
example.tran: 他被她迷得神魂颠倒，连孩子都抛到了九霄云外。

auth_sentence.content: Imagine spending your youth besotted with pop music, and wanting to be in a band.
auth_sentence.res_content: Imagine spending your youth besotted with pop music, and wanting to be in a band.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Imagine spending your youth besotted with pop music, and wanting to be in a band.

auth_sentence.content: Back at the guesthouse, I had left my sneakers near where Mason was resting on the porch with his besotted curassow.
auth_sentence.res_content: Back at the guesthouse, I had left my sneakers near where Mason was resting on the porch with his besotted curassow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Back at the guesthouse, I had left my sneakers near where Mason was resting on the porch with his besotted curassow.

auth_sentence.content: Or perhaps I was so besotted that I simply chose to ignore his bad points.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or perhaps I was so besotted that I simply chose to ignore his bad points.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or perhaps I was so besotted that I simply chose to ignore his bad points.
